ComicInfo.Title: Bosom Buddies, Part 2 of 4: Friendly Fire
ComicInfo.Summary: Power Man & Iron Fist vs. Cable & Deadpool! Totally `Nuff Said! (We know Power Man is known as Cage now, but it sounds better to say it the old way when you have the ampersand in there!) Plus, the BAD Girls mess up the thief who stole the Dominus Objective computer drive! And what the heck is the Dominus Objective anyway? Part 2 (of 4).
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 15:09:22. [CVDB106408]
ComicInfo.Characters: Asp, Black Box, Black Mamba, Cable, Cat, Deadpool, Diamondback, Dominus, Iron Fist, Luke Cage, Weasel
ComicInfo.Teams: B.A.D. Girls Inc., Heroes For Hire, Rand Corporation
